name: Radioactive Man (GDG^meplayer)
description:
Oh no! You stepped into a bucket of toxic waste and the radiation turned you into a horrifying monster. You now want to eat every single person on Earth but there's one thing stopping you: you're trapped in your laboratory and being by all the other scientists in it. Can you kill all the scientists and escape the lab?

Arrow keys to move and walk into scientists to kill them. If the door doesn't open, press r to restart and it should open now.

Art by bart, Eris, Enemby, clayster2012, RawGames,  Lanea Zimmerman, Dan Sevenstar, and the OGA Community.  Music by Jim Hall. Sounds by InspectorJ, deleted_user_5405837, and LittleRobotSoundFactory.
